titleStmt.title: The non-entity of Protestancy. Or a discourse, wherein is demonstrated, that Protestancy is not any reall thing, but in it selfe a platonicall idea; a wast of all positiue fayth; and a meere nothing. VVritten by a Catholike priest of the Society of Iesus
titleStmt.author: Anderton, Lawrence.

notesStmt.note: Catholike priest of the Society of Iesus = Lawrence Anderton.
Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
